synopsis.text: Twelve-year-old Gon Freecss dreams of becoming a Hunter, an elite adventurer who braves perilous lands and seeks out rare treasures and creatures. He aims to follow in the footsteps of his father Ging, a legendary Hunter who abandoned Gon as a baby. To achieve his goal, Gon enrolls in the challenging Hunter Exam, a series of dangerous tasks with a high fatality rate. During the exam, Gon befriends vengeful Kurapika, aspiring doctor Leorio, and skilled assassin Killua. They support each other through the exam's many threats, forging a strong bond despite their differing backgrounds and motives for becoming Hunters. Gon remains fixed on finding his father, Kurapika seeks vengeance for his slain clan, Leorio wants to become a doctor to help the poor, and Killua yearns for freedom from his controlling assassin family. Together they continue to venture into the hunter world after passing the exam. Through frightening beasts, ruthless criminals, and unexplored lands, the friends face many hardships that test the limits of their abilities. As Gon inches closer to finding his father, he and his companions discover the true meaning of being a Hunter on their perilous quest.
